Enterprise Account Executive

Sales New York, NY Full-time

ABOUT PLACER.AI

Placer.ai is transforming how organizations understand the physical world. Our location analytics platform provides unprecedented visibility into locations, markets, and consumer behavior. Placer empowers thousands of customers—from Fortune 500 companies to local governments and nonprofits—to make smarter, data-driven decisions.

What sets us apart?

  • Innovation & Privacy: We’ve built the most advanced location intelligence platform while maintaining an uncompromising commitment to privacy.
  • Rapid Growth: We reached $100M in annual recurring revenue within 6 years, achieved unicorn status ($1B+ valuation) in 2022, and continue to expand as one of North America’s fastest-growing tech companies.
  • Recognition: Named one of Forbes America’s Best Startup Employers and a Deloitte Technology Fast 500 company.

THE ROLE

We are seeking an Enterprise Account Executive to join our high-performing sales team. You’ll be responsible for driving revenue growth by selling our location intelligence platform to Fortune 500 companies across retail, real estate, and other industries that rely on location-based insights.

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Revenue Generation: Achieve and exceed quarterly and annual sales targets
  • Enterprise Sales: Manage complex, multi-stakeholder sales cycles with large enterprise accounts
  • Relationship Building: Develop and maintain relationships with C-level executives and decision makers
  • Solution Selling: Understand customer needs and position our platform as the solution
  • Pipeline Management: Maintain accurate forecasting and pipeline management in CRM
  • Market Development: Identify new opportunities and expand within existing accounts
  • Collaboration: Work closely with marketing, customer success, and product teams

REQUIREMENTS

Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or related field

Experience:

  • 5+ years of enterprise B2B sales experience
  • Track record of consistently meeting or exceeding sales quotas
  • Experience selling SaaS or data analytics solutions preferred
  • Background in retail, real estate, or location-based services is a plus

Sales Skills:

  • Enterprise Sales: Experience with complex, long sales cycles ($100K+ deals)
  • Consultative Selling: Ability to understand customer needs and provide solutions
  • Relationship Building: Strong networking and relationship management abilities
  • Negotiation: Excellent negotiation and closing skills

Technical Understanding:

  • Ability to understand and articulate technical product benefits
  • Experience with data analytics or business intelligence platforms
  • Familiarity with API integrations and technical sales processes

Soft Skills:

  • Excellent communication and presentation abilities
  • Strong organizational and time management skills
  • Resilient and persistent with a positive attitude
  • Team player with collaborative approach

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

  • MBA or advanced business degree
  • Experience in location analytics, retail technology, or real estate tech
  • Background selling to Fortune 500 companies
  • Knowledge of privacy regulations and data governance
  • Experience with Salesforce and sales automation tools

COMPENSATION & BENEFITS

  • Base Salary: Competitive base salary commensurate with experience
  • Commission: Uncapped commission structure with accelerators
  • OTE: $200K+ on-target earnings for experienced reps
  • Equity: Meaningful equity participation in a unicorn company
  • Benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, vision, and 401k benefits

WHY JOIN PLACER.AI?

  • Market Opportunity: Sell in a rapidly growing and emerging market
  • Product Advantage: Represent the market-leading location intelligence platform
  • Growth Trajectory: Join a unicorn company with strong momentum
  • Sales Support: Work with best-in-class marketing and sales enablement teams
  • Career Development: Opportunity for advancement in a scaling sales organization

NOTEWORTHY LINKS

  • Placer.ai’s $100M Round C Funding
  • The Anchor (Data in Action)
  • Placer.ai in the News
  • Video: Placer for Commercial Real Estate

Equal Opportunity Employer: Placer.ai is an equal opportunity employer with a global remote workforce. We are committed to a drug-free workplace and providing reasonable accommodations for applicants with disabilities.
